video_prompt: Neo-futuristic city at night, upward pan. Flying vehicles weave through towering skyscrapers, ablaze with shifting neon and holographic displays. Below, illuminated futuristic cars move along wet streets, reflecting dynamic lights. Pedestrians flow, their silhouettes hinting at varied forms. Focus on relentless, vibrant urban motion.
image_prompt: **Cyberpunk city at night, looking up a neon-lit street with towering skyscrapers, flying vehicles, and bustling pedestrians on wet pavement. Dominant colors are electric purples, pinks, turquoises, and oranges, with glowing digital billboards and futuristic cars. High-tech, vibrant, and overwhelming urban scene.**
refined_video_prompt: Camera pans upward, revealing a city in constant flux. Flying vehicles ceaselessly weave through towering structures. Neon and holographic displays dynamically shift, pulse, and change across building facades. Below, futuristic cars glide, their reflections shimmering with ever-changing street illumination. Pedestrian streams undulate along pathways. Focus on relentless, vibrant urban motion and the continuous alteration of light and movement.
